attributes.action: Enforce cyclists to take a test an obtain a licence.
attributes.additional_details:
To make the highways safer for everyone.
So Cyclists are aware of the dangers they pose to other licensed road users.
attributes.background: Enforce a test and basic understanding of road rules like a CBT test

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607217
